item.title: Rancid - Fall Back Down
item.description:
Don’t worry
about me
I am gonna
make it alright
Got my
enemies crosses
Out and
in my sight
I take a
bad situation
Gonna make
it right
In the shadows
of darkness
I stand in
the light
You see
it’s our style
To keep
it true
I had a bad year
and I go through
I’ve been
knocked out
Beat down
black and blue
She’s not the one
coming back for you
She’s not the one
coming back for you
If I fall
back down
You’re gonna help
me back up again
If I fall
back down
You’re gonna
be my friend

back down

me back up again

back down
You’re gonna
be my friend
It takes disaster
to learn a lesson
You’re gonna
make it through

nights
Some people betrays
one and cause reason
Were gonna make
everything alright

Well the
worst of times
They don’t
phase me
Even if I look and
act really crazy
I went way down
she betrayed me
Now my vision is
no longer hazy
I’m very lucky
to have my crew
They stood by me
when she flew
